current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Inspector General of the Environmental
		  Protection Agency to include certain assessments in reports.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Environment and Public
			 Works

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
not later than April 30 and October 31 of each
			 calendar year, the

Inspector General of the
			 Environmental Protection Agency

achieved compliance during the period covered

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law,

header.#text:

			 General reports

text.#text:
the portions of section
			 4 of Executive Order 12866 (58 Fed. Reg. 51735 (September 30, 1993)) and
